class gstBT_Node

This class represents nodes within the gstBinTree class.

From header file: gstBinTree.h

Constructors and Destructors
gstBT_Node
~gstBT_Node
Functions
axis Active axis access method.
depth Depth of this node.
getChild Get the ith child node.
getChildren Sort both children into a "near" and "far" division relative to a particular axis and plane.

getTree Get the partition tree which contains this node.
